name: Dragon Claws
desc:
You transform your hands into large dragon claws. They use either your Strength or your Dexterity to determine your attack and damage bonus, and deal 1d8 slashing damage on a hit. You can't attack with your claws if they are carrying a weapon or shield.

While the spell is active, you can make one attack with your claws for 1 AP if both hands are empty.
empower: The claws grow sharper and deal 1d10 damage instead. A creature struck twice in one turn by your claws takes bonus damage equal to your spellcasting modifier.
